description: From a series of 12 lithographs produced for Der Mantel (The Coat) by Nicolai Gogol, Kiepenheuer Verlag, Potsdam-Berlin, 1919; a man stands in a black coat with his arms to his sides; behind him another man has his hands placed on the first man's shoulders; a window in the upper right has rays of sun coming through
inscription: LL in pencil, below image: 5) | LR of sheet, in pencil: Gogol : der Mantel. / LL of sheet, in pencil: Sonderdruck.
portfolio: From Plate 5 from Der Mantel (The Coat), Nicolai Gogol, Kiepenheuer Verlag, Potsdam-Berlin, 1919
signed: BC in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté
title: Akaki Get Measured for a New Coat, Plate 5 from Der Mantel (The Coat)
